title: LzardsBackupConfig
description: Describes config options for the LZARDS backup task

urlType.description: The type of access URL to pass to LZARDS: S3 direct access OR cloudfront

cloudfrontEndpoint.description: cloudfront endpoint URL/host. Required if urlType is cloudfront

failTaskWhenFileBackupFail.description: Indicates if the task will fail when file backup request fails

lzardsProvider.description: lzardsProvider to use in the LZARDS backup request.   Overrides the global terraform `lzards_provider` deployment-set configuration
